title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Write and submit the project proposal by the deadline.

title: Design Landing Page
description: Create a visually appealing landing page for the website.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Integrate user authentication with Google Sign-In and custom login system.

title: Task List Drag-and-Drop
description: Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task lists on the dashboard.

title: Create User Profiles
description: Design and implement user profiles with profile pictures.

title: Add Task Editing Feature
description: Enable users to edit task details and save changes.

title: Implement Notifications
description: Integrate toast notifications for task assignments, updates, and deadlines.

title: Optimize for Mobile
description: Ensure the application is responsive and works well on various devices.

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Create unit tests for backend logic using testing tools.

title: Implement WebSocket for Real-Time Updates
description: Enable real-time updates for collaborative editing of tasks.

title: Design Data Visualization
description: Create charts and graphs to visualize task completion statistics.

title: Implement CRON Jobs for Reminders
description: Set up CRON jobs for sending task reminders at specified times.

title: Enhance Security Measures
description: Implement security best practices, secure against injection attacks, and XSS.

title: Implement Search Functionality
description: Add a search bar for quickly finding tasks based on keywords or categories.

title: Collaboration Features
description: Enable users to share tasks and collaborate with others.

title: Write Unit Tests for Frontend
description: Develop unit tests for frontend components using testing libraries.

title: Optimize Backend for Scalability
description: Design the backend to be scalable for potential future growth.

title: Implement Task Categories and Labels
description: Create a categorization system for tasks with labels and categories.

title: Enhance Dashboard Data Visualization
description: Improve charts and graphs for better visualization of task data.

title: Create Task Manager Mobile App
description: Develop a mobile application for managing tasks on the go.
